references.paper_title: Proximal Mean-Field for Neural Network Quantization
references.reason: This paper introduces a proximal mean-field approach for neural network quantization, which is a refinement of the mean-field approximation used in the current work.

references.paper_title: BinaryConnect: Training Deep Neural Networks with Binary Weights During Propagations
references.reason: This paper introduced the BinaryConnect algorithm, a fundamental method for training binary neural networks that uses binary weights during propagations.
This foundational paper introduced binarized neural networks, which use 1-bit representations for each weight, resulting in a 32-fold reduction in model size compared to single-precision weights.

references.paper_title: XNOR-Net: ImageNet Classification Using Binary Convolutional Neural Networks
references.reason: This work introduced XNOR-Net, a highly efficient binary convolutional neural network that achieves high accuracy on the ImageNet dataset, advancing the field of efficient deep learning.

references.paper_title: Imagenet classification with deep convolutional neural networks
references.reason: This paper introduced AlexNet, a deep convolutional neural network that won the 2012 ImageNet competition, significantly impacting the field of computer vision and deep learning.
